channel.title: Learning Java with in Hours(Videos)
channel.description:
well if you are like me and don't learn easy from reading but from watching then doing. then you will love this. there is over 85 videos step by step very detailed videos of Java Programming.
Here is the URL for the playlist: [url=http://www.youtube.com/view_play_list?p=FE2CE09D83EE3E28]http://www.youtube.com/view_play_list?p=FE2CE09D83EE3E28[/url]
my self i am not even half way through. and i have learn't a whole lot.
bie.

item.title: Learning Java with in Hours(Videos)
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

i spent the last hour watching these. it more taught me better ways to do things, than new things. pretty basic. but i like it.

EDIT: if statement part really helped me… thats something i needed a touch up on

item.title: Learning Java with in Hours(Videos)
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:11, topic:345429”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=441808.msg3246441#msg3246441 date=1277408430]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=441808.msg3246281#msg3246281 date=1277398428]

[quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=441808.msg3246231#msg3246231 date=1277394083]

Should help some of the less educated programmers. good job
[/quote]Such as yourself, am I right?

I dont need a video to help me. im sorry you have to waste your time watching it because you lack skill, but dont take your anger out on me bud.
[/quote]These videos actually contain some information that I doubt 90% (including you) of this community has any idea it actually exists. All I’m saying is, don’t prance around saying that it can help “less educated” programmers as if that dismisses yourself. Those videos, I can guarantee, contain more information than you have knowledge of. Again, I’m not saying I’m better than anyone else, I’m simply telling you you shouldn’t act as if this video can’t teach you something because you have the “skillz” to make a private server.

I never said i didnt use it and i didnt need it, did i? Nope, so quit talking shit.
[/quote]I have not once said anything you’d consider “talking shit”. You blatantly said:

[quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=441808.msg3246153#msg3246153 date=1277388554]
Should help some of the less educated programmers
[/quote]When you said this, were you referring to yourself? As a less educated programmer? Because just last post you said “I never said i didn’t need it”, insinuating your use of it.

Being myself, this bothered me due to the constant hierarchy of overinflated, egotistic elitism throughout this forum. In other words, it pisses me off when people act like they don’t need something because they’re too good for it. This is what causes shitty elitism in this forum. You’re not better than anyone else, and for the THIRD time now, neither am I.

Oh by the way, I would agree with you in the fact that what you originally posted isn’t relevant to elitism entirely… But since you’ve continued to argue with me upon me explaining my reason entirely, you’ve easily proven my point. If you can’t see past what I’m trying to explain to you right now, I no longer care.[/quote]

Reaper, I’d like to marry you, are you okay with that?

Read full topic

item.title: Learning Java with in Hours(Videos)
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:9, topic:345429”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=441808.msg3246281#msg3246281 date=1277398428]

[quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=441808.msg3246231#msg3246231 date=1277394083]

Should help some of the less educated programmers. good job
[/quote]Such as yourself, am I right?

I dont need a video to help me. im sorry you have to waste your time watching it because you lack skill, but dont take your anger out on me bud.
[/quote]These videos actually contain some information that I doubt 90% (including you) of this community has any idea it actually exists. All I’m saying is, don’t prance around saying that it can help “less educated” programmers as if that dismisses yourself. Those videos, I can guarantee, contain more information than you have knowledge of. Again, I’m not saying I’m better than anyone else, I’m simply telling you you shouldn’t act as if this video can’t teach you something because you have the “skillz” to make a private server.

I never said i didnt use it and i didnt need it, did i? Nope, so quit talking shit.[/quote]I have not once said anything you’d consider “talking shit”. You blatantly said:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:345429”]Should help some of the less educated programmers[/quote]When you said this, were you referring to yourself? As a less educated programmer? Because just last post you said “I never said i didn’t need it”, insinuating your use of it.

Being myself, this bothered me due to the constant hierarchy of overinflated, egotistic elitism throughout this forum. In other words, it pisses me off when people act like they don’t need something because they’re too good for it. This is what causes shitty elitism in this forum. You’re not better than anyone else, and for the THIRD time now, neither am I.

Oh by the way, I would agree with you in the fact that what you originally posted isn’t relevant to elitism entirely… But since you’ve continued to argue with me upon me explaining my reason entirely, you’ve easily proven my point. If you can’t see past what I’m trying to explain to you right now, I no longer care.

Read full topic
